tool_description: Unifies data from multiple social media platforms into a standardized format for cross-platform analysis and comparison.

platform_datasets.description: Array of platform dataset identifiers to unify

unification_schema.description: Schema for unified data format (standard, custom, minimal)

handle_duplicates.description: Whether to identify and handle duplicate content across platforms

error_messages: Insufficient platforms: At least 2 platform datasets are required for unification
Schema mismatch: Platform data structures are incompatible with unification schema
Invalid unification schema: Schema must be one of [standard, custom, minimal]
Field mapping errors: Custom field mappings contain invalid or missing fields
usage: Provide platform_datasets array and unification_schema. Optionally specify custom field_mapping and duplicate handling preferences for unified output.

unified_records.description: Total number of unified records created
